description:
Attorneys Jason T. Schneider and Robert M. Hammers Jr. are the co-founders of our Atlanta law firm, Schneider Hammers. Our firm represent the interests of injured victims and the families of victims living in the Atlanta metropolitan area and surrounding North Georgia. We regularly assist clients in pursuing the compensation they need due to the following:

  • Car, bicycle and pedestrian accidents
  • Wrongful death
  • Trucking accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Workers' compensation
  • Medical malpractice
  • Pharmaceutical errors and dangerous drugs

Our law firm's founders have nearly 40 years of combined legal experience, and they are two of Atlanta's most highly respected trial lawyers. Both have earned a number of honors and awards for their long records of success and dedication to their clients' needs. Our two associate attorneys are also highly regarded young attorneys, and both are building reputations as knowledgeable client advocates.

Whether your injury or loss is the result of a workplace accident, a reckless or drunk driver, or a professional's substandard care, the attorneys at the law firm of Schneider Hammers will fight for the compensation you need to recover from your injuries or loss. We will work diligently to make the future as secure as possible for you and those you love. To learn more about your legal options, you can take advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation.
